channel.title: Sick on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Sick on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: today i lost it
item.description: this domain I just purchased. it is gone. disappeared. hopefully it will come back. i keep waking up pretty sick. like there is a phlegm party in my head or something. I hate phlegm. so gross. I feel like demons are being spawned from my orifaces every morning. it is disgusting. whee. love gross. no I have to find this domain.

item.title: Sick Sick Sick Sick
item.description: I am really sick. it sucks quite a bit. I have a sore throat, achy bones, tired joints, sinus headache, and I can’t eat. sad day. I have been in bed all day and I was in bed al yesterday. it sucks. not a good scene at all. especially since I am unable to take a sick day/days at work. no good at all. anyway.. so on friday I went to a party but went home cuz I was ill - yesterday I went to hang out with kelly perry.

item.title: audreyhacking.com
item.description: heh. check it out. I am famous. hehe. supposedly their is a book. I need the book ;)i can’t sleep. I am sick. I can’t sleep. I am sick.

item.title: work si cola
item.description: I am at work. doing work. and I am really sick. it sucks. i am tired. Hopefully I will take off early and curl up and sleep.

item.title: Sick
item.description: After being rather sick for the last couple days I have decided to cut off my own arms. You should all go by the game set it rules.
